Quick Setup

Connect SpotLy to your Spotify account in 3 easy steps

1

Create a Spotify App

Go to the Spotify Developer Dashboard and create a new app. Name it anything you like.

2

Add Redirect URI

In your Spotify app settings, add this as a Redirect URI:

http://127.0.0.1:8080/callback Copy

Click to copy, then paste in Spotify Dashboard → Edit Settings → Redirect URIs

3

Enter Your Credentials

Copy your Client ID and Client Secret from the Spotify app page:
